title: Everest Line
summary: The Everest Line is a neutral miner line. These ships require no blueprints and focus on sheer mining power. The Everest Line is generally preferred over the Koronis Line because of its better mining rates.
full_text:
The Everest Line is a neutral miner line. These ships require no blueprints and focus on sheer mining power. The Everest Line is generally preferred over the Koronis Line because of its better mining rates.
Like all warship miners, they require more resources to craft than combat warships.
T1
T2
Corvette
Frigate
Destroyer

N/A
N/A
N/A
Everest

Most efficient miners in the game-can easily mine entire rings with Strip Miner II's equipped.
Decent health for a non-combat warship.

Incredibly slow — little chance of surviving any pirate encounter.

This line is easily able to mine out asteroid fields. Therefore, it is recommended to use these ships for bulk mining missions.
These ships are very cumbersome, and have little chance of escaping danger without the use of a Lightburner.
For full mining focus, equip these ships with as many Strip Miner II's as possible, and change all PDT's to the Tractor variant.

The Everest line ships are named after various mountains.
It is not yet confirmed whether the badger line is located within the Everest line, though it is theorized to be so.
